resources.string: Lady Fortune turns a blind eye
WARNING! Your actions may have consequences
Go to previous location for verification!

Hope you enjoyed CodeHunt.
There were clues and references all around the questions,
you can ask us for the behind the scenes codes, or you can try decompiling this app.
(If you had decompiled the app in the beginning, you could have won the competition in 1 minute!!)
If this event created an incentive within you towards liking coding, do approach us!!! We would be happy to share even more about the world of development, competitive coding, and a heck lot more !!
Liked the event? Hated it? \n Whats your opinion?
